description: Numbers n such that phi(n) | sigma_4(n).
comments: sigma_4(n) is the sum of the 4th powers of the divisors of n (A001159).sigma_{8j+4}(x)/phi[x] is an integer for j=0,..,500 for x=1,2,3,6,249,498 and supposed to hold for possible larger terms of A015762 and all j. Compare with comments to A015759, A091285, A015770. - _Labos Elemer_, May 27 2004
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
